i1.name: Eternal Hunger
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Warwick''' deals {{as|{{pp|12 to 46}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}.

While below {{as|{{sti|health|50% '''maximum''' health}}}}, '''Warwick''' also {{tip|heal|heals}} for 100% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} dealt by ''Eternal Hunger'', increased to 250% while below {{as|25% '''maximum''' health}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Warwick deals 12undefined âˆ’ 46undefined (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit.
While below 50% maximum health, Warwick also heals for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by Eternal Hunger, increased to 250% while below 25% maximum health.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the '''bonus''' damage cannot).
* ''Eternal Hunger'' does not affect structures.

q1.name: Jaws of the Beast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|lunge|lunges}} at the target enemy, biting them after {{rutngt|0.25}} seconds to deal them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|heal}} himself for a portion of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} dealt by the {{tt|ability|The on-hits are not calculated into the heal.}}. ''Jaws of the Beast'' applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects, and {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.

{{sbc|Hold:}} ''Jaws of the Beast'' can be held down where '''Warwick''' performs the bite as usual then begins to {{tip|channel|charge}} for up to {{fd|0.5}} seconds, during which he {{tip|dash|dashes}} behind his target and sticks to them, following their position anywhere on the map. The duration of the charge is extended if the target is under the effect of a {{tip|dash}} or a {{tip|airborne|displacement}}.
During the ability, '''Warwick''' is also {{tip|displacement immune}}.
If the target dies prior to '''Warwick''' reaching them, the {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded unless the ability was held.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Warwick lunges at the target enemy, biting them after Unknown value: rutngt 0.25 seconds to deal them magic damage and heal himself for a portion of the post-mitigation damage dealt by the ability. Jaws of the Beast applies on-hit and on-attack effects, and Unknown value: stil life steal at 100% effectiveness.
Hold: Jaws of the Beast can be held down where Warwick performs the bite as usual then begins to charge for up to 0.5 seconds, during which he dashes behind his target and sticks to them, following their position anywhere on the map. The duration of the charge is extended if the target is under the effect of a dash or a displacement.
During the ability, Warwick is also displacement immune.
If the target dies prior to Warwick reaching them, the cooldown is refunded unless the ability was held.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{as|120% AD}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 10}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Healing Percentage|{{ap|30 to 90}}%}}
q1.notes:
* ''Jaws of the Beast'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* ''Jaws of the Beast'' is the only ability that combines {{tip|channel|channeling}} with {{tip|displacement immune|displacement immunity}}. Every {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} {{tip|crowd control}} effect that is not resisted by the displacement immunity will prematurely stop the {{tip|dash}}.
** The bite can still occur if cast before the crowd control application, but '''Warwick''' cannot start channeling.
** Abilities that apply both {{tip|stun}} and {{tip|airborne}} at the same time cause '''Warwick''' to ignore the displacement, but prematurely stop the channel and the dash.
* ''Jaws of the Beast's'' channel cannot be initiated while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}. '''Warwick''' can only use the normal cast.
** The channel will '''not''' be interrupted by either of the two effects, despite the lock-on being a [[Channel#Movement Channels|movement channel]].
* It has been special cased so '''Warwick''' will specifically not follow an enemy's {{si|Recall}}, or {{cai|I|Sion}} when reviving (before dealing damage).
* '''Warwick''' will follow enemies that move via {{tip|attach|attachment}} effects but the lock-on will '''not''' be extended.
* While ''Jaws of the Beast'' does not use Quick Casting by default, click-and-hold is comparable to the input required to use {{ai|Bone Skewer|Pyke}} or {{ai|Comet Spear|Pantheon}}. It does not accept two-click input (e.g. First Cast and Recast) that abilities like {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} or {{ai|Decimating Smash|Sion}} use in Standard Casting.
* The bite always occurs after the same delay, however the time spent lunging does not, which depends based on the range ''Jaw of the Beast'' was cast away from the target, up to a lunge duration of {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
** The lunge duration does not affect the {{tip|lockout}} timer on '''Warwick''', which is the same of the bite.
** '''Warwick's''' lunge always places him to his {{sti|attack range|{{as|attack range}}}} to the center of his target.
* '''Warwick's''' dash will place him up to the edge of his {{sti|attack range|{{as|attack range}}}} from the target.
* '''Warwick''' will attempt to basic attack the target after a short delay.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Warwick''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack = false|cast = {{ai|Primal Howl|Warwick}} is usable. {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}} and {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} are disabled.|move=false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts|items=interrupts,true,interrupts,false,interrupts,melee|consume=true}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: 120% AD (+ 100% AP) (+ % of target's maximum health)

  • Healing Percentage: %

st_slices: 120% AD (+ 100% AP) (+ % of target's '''maximum''' health)

w1.name: Blood Hunt
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While alive, '''Warwick''' marks all enemy {{tip|champions}} who are damaged by an allied unit to below {{as|{{sti|health|50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}} as ''Blood Hunted'', highlighting the shortest path to them. '''Warwick''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while following the highlighted path.

'''Warwick''' also gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} upon {{tip|basic attack|basic attacking}} a ''Blood Hunted'' target or an enemy unit who is below {{as|{{sti|health|50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
These bonuses are enhanced to 250% against targets below {{as|{{sti|health|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.

Upon [[Combat status|entering combat]] with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, the {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} is lost for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, but builds up again every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' briefly senses all nearby enemies within a large radius and marks the nearest enemy {{tip|champion}} as ''Blood Hunted'' for 8 seconds, regardless of their {{as|{{sti|health|'''current''' health}}}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While alive, Warwick marks all enemy champions who are damaged by an allied unit to below 50% of their maximum health as Blood Hunted, highlighting the shortest path to them. Warwick gains bonus movement speed while following the highlighted path.
Warwick also gains bonus attack speed upon basic attacking a Blood Hunted target or an enemy unit who is below 50% of their maximum health.
These bonuses are enhanced to 250% against targets below 20% of their maximum health.
Upon Combat status with an enemy champion, the bonus movement speed is lost for 0.5 seconds, but builds up again every 0.25 seconds over the next 3.5 seconds.
Active: Warwick briefly senses all nearby enemies within a large radius and marks the nearest enemy champion as Blood Hunted for 8 seconds, regardless of their current health.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|35 to 55}}%|Enhanced Movement Speed|{{ap|35*2.5 to 55*2.5}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|70 to 110}}%|Enhanced Attack Speed|{{ap|70*2.5 to 110*2.5}}%}}
w1.notes:
* Enemies who are ''Blood Hunted'' will display marks above their heads while hearing {{sm2|Warwick.spellWHunt04.ogg|''ominous music''}} until they are no longer ''Blood Hunted'', with a small delay.
* ''Blood Hunt'' can detect and target [[Champion_summoned_units#decoys|decoys]].
* The blood trail, although described as a trail, does '''not''' indicate where the target has been - only the quickest route to their current location, and it will update as '''Warwick''' and/or the target move.
* '''Warwick''' will lose his movement speed bonus if enemies that are not ''Blood Hunted'' stay exactly between him and the ''Blood Hunted'' target.
** The same applies to enemy champions that went under the threshold by taking [[Nexus Obelisk]] damage or to units that spawn with their current health below the threshold (i.e {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}).
* The detection from ''Blood Hunt'' is similar to the effects of {{tip|obscured vision}} rather than a form of {{tip|sight}} - it grants positional information only. It does not explicitly inform '''Warwick''' about who is low health or if they are alone.
* The official ability descriptions says the bonuses are tripled, however the actual multiplier is {{fd|2.5}}. {{bug|2}}
* ''Blood Hunt'' is always cast from the original casting position.

e1.name: Primal Howl
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' gains {{tip|damage reduction}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds. ''Primal Howl'' can be recast after 1 second, and automatically does so when the effect ends.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Warwick''' howls, ending ''Primal Howl's'' effects and causing all nearby enemies to {{tip|flee}} from him for 1 second, during which they are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90%.
Starting {{ais|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} channel while ''Primal Howl'' is active will initiate the recast without ending the ''damage reduction'' buff prematurely.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Warwick gains damage reduction for up to 2.5 seconds. Primal Howl can be recast after 1 second, and automatically does so when the effect ends.
Recast: Warwick howls, ending Primal Howl's effects and causing all nearby enemies to flee from him for 1 second, during which they are slowed by 90%.
Starting Infinite Duress's channel while Primal Howl is active will initiate the recast without ending the damage reduction buff prematurely.
e1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger without being considered as an ability activation.
* The recast's howling animation has a {{fd|0.5}}-second {{tip|lockout}} time.
** This will also cancel '''Warwick's''' basic attack.
** '''Warwick''' cannot attack or cast abilities during the animation, instead the last input will be buffered to play after it ends.
* '''Warwick''' will automatically recast if he enters {{tip|resurrection}}.

r1.name: Infinite Duress
r1.target_range: {{tt|{{as|250% of average movement speed in the last {{fd|2.5}} seconds}}|Updates every 0.25 seconds.}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} in the target direction, during which he is {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}}.

If '''Warwick''' collides with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, he stops and {{tip|knockdown|knocks them down}} and begins to {{tip|channel}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which the target is {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, {{tip|true sight|revealed}}, and dealt 6 instances of {{as|magic damage}}.
'''Warwick''' is {{tip|heal|healed}} for 100% of all {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} he deals to his target during ''Infinite Duress''.
''Infinite Duress'' applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects 3 times, and {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Warwick leaps in the target direction, during which he is immune to crowd control.
If Warwick collides with an enemy champion, he stops and knocks them down and begins to channel for 1.5 seconds, during which the target is suppressed, revealed, and dealt 6 instances of magic damage.
Warwick is healed for 100% of all post-mitigation damage he deals to his target during Infinite Duress.
Infinite Duress applies on-hit and on-attack effects 3 times, and Unknown value: stil life steal at 100% effectiveness.
r1.notes:
* ''Infinite Duress'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* The minimum range of the ability is 275 units, based on the minimum movement speed that a champion can have (110) while still being able to move. The "base" range of this ability is {{fd|837.5}} because of his 335 base movement speed.
** Considering movement speed soft caps, with {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}}, this range increases to {{ap|(335*1.35*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.4*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.45*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.5*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*1.55*0.5+230)*2.5}}, further increased to {{ap|(335*(1+0.35*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.4*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.45*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.5*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.55*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5}} against enemy champions {{as|below 20% health}}.
* The ability deals a total of 9 damage instances that are done in cycles of 3 hits every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, each divided in two instances. The first instance deals 2 hits and triggers the {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects once, while the second instance deals the remaining last hit.
* If '''Warwick''' does not collide with a champion, he will slide a {{tt|fixed distance|estimated 150 units}} past the maximum range during which he is no longer crowd control immune and unable to declare basic attacks or cast movement abilities, including {{si|Flash}}, but being able to cast {{ai|Jaws of the Beast|Warwick}} and {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}}, with the former also interrupting the slide.
** '''Warwick''' is able to cast {{ai|Primal Howl|Warwick}} at any time during the dash.
* The dash will be interrupted instantly if an enemy champion {{tip|blink|blinks}} in close proximity of '''Warwick'''.{{bug}}
* '''Warwick''' gains the {{tip|cc-immune|cc-immunity}} at the start of the cast time.
* {{tip|Cleanse|Cleansing}} the {{tip|suppression}} does not interrupt the {{tip|channel}} and '''Warwick''' will continue to strike.
** ''Infinite Duress'' is special cased to have its channel interrupted by {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}} and {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} if they affect '''Warwick's''' target.
* If the target is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} or protected by {{tip|spell shield}} upon collision, '''Warwick''' will not start the {{tip|channel}}.
* If the target is in a {{tip|zombie state}}, '''Warwick''' will stop the channel after ~{{fd|0.5}} seconds of hitting them.
* ''Infinite Duress'' covers '''Warwick's''' hitbox, meaning he will collide with enemy champions that are particularly close to him.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Warwick''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|move=false|cast=false|attack=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false}}
